abilities.name: Ability Score Increase
abilities.description: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

abilities.name: Languages
abilities.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Keen Senses
abilities.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
abilities.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

abilities.name: Trance
abilities.description: Elves meditate deeply for 4 hours a day instead of sleeping.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
abilities.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

abilities.name: Skill Versatility
abilities.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

abilities.name: Ability Score Increase
abilities.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience
abilities.description: Advantage on saving throws against poison, and resistance to poison damage.

abilities.name: Dwarven Combat Training
abilities.description: Proficiency with battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.

abilities.name: Tool Proficiency
abilities.description: Proficiency with one artisan’s tool: smith’s tools, brewer’s supplies, or mason’s tools.

abilities.name: Stonecunning
abilities.description: Double proficiency bonus on History checks related to stonework.

abilities.name: Lucky
abilities.description: When you roll a 1 on d20 for an attack, ability check, or saving throw, reroll and use the new roll.

abilities.name: Brave
abilities.description: Advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

abilities.name: Halfling Nimbleness
abilities.description: Can move through the space of creatures larger than you.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Gnome Cunning
abilities.description: Advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Relentless Endurance
abilities.description: When reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, drop to 1 HP instead (once per long rest).

abilities.name: Savage Attacks
abilities.description: When scoring a critical hit with melee weapon, roll one extra weapon damage die.

abilities.name: Draconic Ancestry
abilities.description: You have a breath weapon and damage resistance based on your dragon ancestry.

abilities.name: Breath Weapon
abilities.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy in a 15-ft cone or 30-ft line (based on ancestry), usable once per short/long rest.

abilities.name: Damage Resistance
abilities.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Hellish Resistance
abilities.description: Resistance to fire damage.

abilities.name: Infernal Legacy
abilities.description: Know thaumaturgy cantrip. At level 3, can cast hellish rebuke once per day. At level 5, can cast darkness once per day.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Celestial Resistance
abilities.description: Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

abilities.name: Healing Hands
abilities.description: As an action, touch a creature to heal HP equal to your level (once per long rest).

abilities.name: Light Bearer
abilities.description: Know the thaumaturgy cantrip.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

abilities.name: Elemental Resistance
abilities.description: Resistance to acid (Earth), lightning (Air), fire (Fire), or cold (Water) damage depending on subtype.

abilities.name: Unending Breath
abilities.description: Can hold breath indefinitely while not incapacitated.

abilities.name: Natural Athlete
abilities.description: Proficiency in Athletics skill.

abilities.name: Stone’s Endurance
abilities.description: Once per short rest, reduce damage dealt to you by 1d12 + Constitution modifier.

abilities.name: Powerful Build
abilities.description: Count as one size larger when determining carrying capacity and push/pull/drag limits.

abilities.name: Mountain Born
abilities.description: Resistance to cold damage and acclimated to high altitude.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: See in dim light within 60 feet as bright light, and in darkness as dim light.

abilities.name: Feline Agility
abilities.description: Double your speed for one turn, usable again after moving 0 feet on a turn.

abilities.name: Cat’s Claws
abilities.description: Claws are natural weapons, dealing 1d4 slashing damage.

abilities.name: Cat’s Talent
abilities.description: Proficiency in Perception and Stealth skills.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: See in dim light within 60 feet as bright light, and in darkness as dim light.

abilities.name: Amphibious
abilities.description: Can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Control Air and Water
abilities.description: You know the fog cloud, gust of wind, and wall of water spells once per long rest.

abilities.name: Emissary of the Sea
abilities.description: You can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water.

abilities.name: Firbolg Magic
abilities.description: You can cast detect magic and disguise self once per short or long rest.

abilities.name: Hidden Step
abilities.description: As a bonus action, become invisible until the start of your next turn once per short/long rest.

abilities.name: Powerful Build
abilities.description: Count as one size larger for carrying capacity and push/pull/drag.

abilities.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
abilities.description: You can communicate with beasts and plants.

abilities.name: Expert Forgery
abilities.description: You can duplicate other handwriting and craftwork perfectly.

abilities.name: Kenku Training
abilities.description: Proficiency in two skills or tools from among Acrobatics, Deception, Stealth, and Sleight of Hand.

abilities.name: Mimicry
abilities.description: You can mimic any sounds you have heard.

abilities.name: Flightless
abilities.description: Cannot fly, despite having wings.

abilities.name: Bite
abilities.description: Natural weapon that deals 1d6 + Strength piercing damage.

abilities.name: Cunning Artisan
abilities.description: Can craft simple items from slain creatures' remains.

abilities.name: Hold Breath
abilities.description: Can hold breath for up to 15 minutes.

abilities.name: Natural Armor
abilities.description: Base AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier.

abilities.name: Hungry Jaws
abilities.description: Once per short rest, as a bonus action, make a special bite attack that grants temporary HP.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: See in dim light within 60 feet as bright light, and in darkness as dim light.

abilities.name: Fury of the Small
abilities.description: Once per short rest, add extra damage equal to your level when attacking a creature larger than you.

abilities.name: Nimble Escape
abilities.description: Can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each turn.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: See in dim light within 60 feet as bright light, and in darkness as dim light.

abilities.name: Aggressive
abilities.description: As a bonus action, move up to your speed toward an enemy you can see.

abilities.name: Powerful Build
abilities.description: Count as one size larger for carrying capacity and push/pull/drag.

abilities.name: Menacing
abilities.description: Proficiency in Intimidation skill.

abilities.name: Darkvision
abilities.description: See in dim light within 60 feet as bright light, and in darkness as dim light.

abilities.name: Brute
abilities.description: Your melee weapon attacks deal one extra damage die.

abilities.name: Surprise Attack
abilities.description: If you surprise a creature and hit it on the first turn, your attacks deal extra damage.

abilities.name: Long-Limbed
abilities.description: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach is 5 feet greater than normal.
